name: Business Systems Support Engineer
description:
At Arrival, our team is creating best-in-class electric vehicles using a radical new method of design and production. We work with some of the world's leading businesses and governments to achieve our goal of redefining mobility and transport ecosystems, transforming how people and goods travel, and enhancing urban environments for all communities.

Innovation, rapid development, and testing help us to push the boundaries. Our New Method takes our portfolio of patented technologies created in-house and combines it with assembly in Arrival Microfactories. It’s a groundbreaking approach, leading to products with maximum functionality, peak efficiency, and an elevated experience – at a much more competitive price than other electric vehicles, and even fossil fuel vehicles.

Business Systems Support Engineer will be responsible for the development and implementation of solutions within the BS Support team in ARRIVAL which provides new, smooth, advanced, and effective user support.


As part of a BS Support team, a BS Support Engineer will be working specifically with BS software to identify issues, resolve customer complaints and problems, develop and implement solutions as required, and create product problem reports and troubleshooting documents for each issue.


BS Support Engineer will also work closely with development teams to identify and resolve any technical problems that might arise during BS software development and might be also involved in the development and running of the customer training program.

Responsibilities:

  • Provide effective support across different ARRIVAL's business systems to software users, interacting with third-party software vendors as needed.
  • Address customer concerns and issues regarding software installation and operation.
  • Deploy new solutions, applications and upgrades, monitor their impact, and restore systems when necessary.
  • Review problem logs and test programming solutions.
  • Document complaint reports and troubleshooting steps.
  • Manage source code repositories and configuration of the software.
  • Assist and be involved in the software development process to resolve technical issues and create a customer support system.
  • Create technical documents and manuals.

Expertise:

  • Knowledge and understanding of the end-user software support function.
  • Understanding of modern trends in help-desk software and user support area (chatbots etc).
  • Technical skills and background: Python, PostgresSQL, Javascript, ERP, ML.
  • Analytical and measurement skills with the ability to understand customer data.
  • Ability to work independently in a fast-paced and dynamic environment.
  • Attention to detail and a proactive, problem-solving approach is required.
  • Fluent in English.
  • Bachelor’s degree in computer science, software engineering, or a related area.
  • Certifications in areas of programming languages.

Education and Training:

  • Bachelor’s degree in computer science, software engineering, or a related area.
  • Certifications in areas of programming languages.

At Arrival we want all of our employees to feel comfortable bringing their passion, creativity, and individuality to work. We value all cultures, backgrounds, and experiences, as we truly believe that diversity drives innovation. Join our mission to bring better, more sustainable transportation to communities around the world.
